_header: Thou that lookest on mine likeness
_description: Verses accompanying an ‘Image of Pity’ — 12 lines

BodLatLitE17.First Lines:
Thow that lokyst on myn lykenes& haste no pytey on myn
                    peyne…
BodLatLitE17.Last Lines:
…ffor with out þat no pardoun may gaynene none ether
                    Absolucioun et cetera
